name: Sprint3-Paint
description:
Enjoy painting with different shapes, sizes, and colours.

The default shape size is set to 0.5 feel free to change, and adjust the bars for different colours. Top right tab to change shapes 

Right Mouse button - Hold right to clear any mistakes 

Left Mousebutton- Hold left to draw

Press clear to wipe the screen clean

Timed destroy to clean the screen every 3 seconds
